name: El_Snowman
description:
El Snowman is a 3D horror game that I created for my Final Assignment.

The Story and main goal of the game

                The main character is scaring by a snowman in his sleep, he sees a nightmare. In this nightmare, there is a snowman roaming around the house and tries to catch him. If he can find enough wood to burn the heather of the house, he achieves that by escaping from the snowman.

Controls of the  game

  • ‘W/A/S/D’ to move
  • ‘Left Shift’ to sprint
  • ‘E’ to interact
  • ‘F’ to open/close flashlight
  • ‘H’ to hide
  • ‘V’ to vault
